body.name: Wall Mop Wall Cleaner with 85 Inch ​Long Handle, 360° Rotating Microfiber Triangle Mop, Skirting Ceiling Gasket Window Cleaning Kit for Cleaning Painted Wall, Ceiling, Floor, 6 Replacement Pads

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 44 mins
features: ★【85 Inch Wall Cleaner with Long Handle】★--- Our Sanuurfky wall cleaning mop comes with 5 sections extension poles. There is no need to use screws, just attach the poles and mop head together for a quick use. You can also customize it according to the length for you need, the adjustable length range is 25''-85". With this cleaner mop, you can clean your ceiling more easily without the need for ladders or tiptoes.

★【Multi-purpose Cleaner Tool】★--- Thanks to The Sanuurfky 360° rotating mop head and triangular mop pad design, this wall cleaning mop can reach and clean dead corners easily, such as sofa, under the bed, wall corners, and ceiling corners. Besides, it also can be used anywhere you can imagine, not limited for window, floor, room, outdoor, car, wall. It's no doubt that this wall mop will be a good helper in your cleaning work!

★【Stronger Extension Rod】★--- Unlike other wall cleaner mops, our Sanuurfky extension rods of this long handle baseboard cleaner tool are made from 0.4 mm thick hollow lightweight stainless steel metal , and the connection we have also made reinforcement, which means that you can easily lift the mop, and don't worry that the wall mop will bend and deform during use.

★【Wet & Dry Wall Mop】★--- The Sanuurfky wall cleaning mop set are equipped 3 microfiber cleaning pads, 3 chenille mop pads and wiper strip. Chenille pads can be used dry for dusting walls, ceilings and reaching those nasty spider webs. The microfiber cleaning pads can be used wet for mopping and removing grime, perfect for picking wastes and hair removal. These pads are reusable and fully machine washable.

★【Space Saving & Excellent Customer Service】★--- The Sanuurfky cleaning mop has a circular hole that can be hung on a wall or a door. And the mop head and handles are detachable, taking up less space and also drying quickly. If there is any using or quality problem for this wall mop, please feel free to contact us, we will be always here to slove the problem with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used it to dry mop my floors and I like how it swivels to fit corners. I sprayed with Endust and it picks up the dust, particles, etc. easily enough prior to washing. Also very easy to remove mop head to "hand wash" with dish detergent and air dry. So far very happy with this mop set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to clean my walls. It is easy to use along with Zeb wall cleaner. We were able to clean the walls in less than a couple of hours. When you have little kids who love to write on walls. This is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good product idea, bad quality.
reviews.reviewText: Liked the product for its small triangle design. Great concept but cheap quality. Poles are lightweight but really weak if you apply pressure they bend. From picture attached you can see stitching has ripped already on 2 out of the 3 chenille pads. The microfiber pads do not have a slot on the corners and they stick by velcro, once I removed, it took tore the stitching after one single use. If you look closely it is single stitching, not even double or triple to be ruggedize. This is probably the first and last time I will get to use this set. Seems to be disposable. Save your money and buy something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This corner mop works.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this corner dust/wet mop . I does exactly what I wanted and more. It gets close to the quarter round (toe mold)very well and corners . it dusts shoe mole and walls easily. My husband liked it so well he wanted one for cleaning some items of his in his barn(shop). I did order another. I have not done windows yet but will at some point. Also , after dusting I take my mop outside and brush off the mat and reuse so I don't wash it every time. I do live in the country so brushing it off does no harm to anyone. RP

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good wall cleaning product just like picture an pretty easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The middle bows making it difficult to use, feels flimsy.
reviews.reviewText: This arrived with no instructions for assembly or how to use it, and it took me several tries to piece it together because one of the threads would not fit one of the pieces. Now this states it is adjustable- yeah, it is, but you have to unscrew the pieces and screw back together to shorten or lengthen this wall mop. You can’t just twist it to shorten or lengthen, once you assemble it, that’s where it stays. If you have limited storage space you will probably want to take it back apart and toss it in a storage bag, which it does not come with. This would have been handy considering how much work goes into assembling and taking it back apart. They knew this would be a chore.At its longest length the middle bows when you apply pressure. I’m not applying excessive pressure either, just simply mopping my apartment walls with some cleaner I sprayed on the mop pad. Nothing excessively dirty, so that tells me this isn’t the greatest quality of materials, but for the price, I expected as much, just didn’t expect it to be THIS flimsy.You get several pads of two types, which work well when washing the walls. I found it cleaned pretty well with my choice of all natural and gentle floor cleaner.I like the idea, and it does do a decent job, but I fear it’s not going to last very long because of the way the middle bows. If the middle were sturdier, I would be able to rate this higher. As it is, I just can’t.This is my 100% honest review after testing and using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm short and this very long extention allows me to reach all the spiderwebs and dust on the walls.
